snippet: U.S. federal law enforcement on Friday sought the public's help in tracking down two serial bank robbers who have held up a combined 19 banks in Southern California in a little over a year, but who are not believed to be acting in concert....

headline.print_headline: Public Help Sought in Southern California Serial Bank Robberies
headline.main: Public Help Sought in Southern California Serial Bank Robberies

lead_paragraph: U.S. federal law enforcement on Friday sought the public's help in tracking down two serial bank robbers who have held up a combined 19 banks in Southern California in a little over a year, but who are not believed to be acting in concert.
